name: Plug Bugs
description:
Plug Bugs

Help these two ladybugs harness the power of electricity to escape and reunite with each other!

Control both bugs yourself, or use local co-op to team up with a friend!

I made this game for a Winter Game Jam with the theme 'Interlock.'

Controls:
WASD: Move the Left Bug
Arrow Keys: Move the Right Bug
Spacebar: Both bugs pick up/drop plug boxes

Credits:
Game made by Aven Woodard
Simple Toon Shader by Dmitry Chalovskiy
